title: Project-Based Instructional Design Education for Developing Mathematical Assessment Tools

context.prior_knowledge: Basic knowledge of mathematics and foundational understanding of assessment tool development
context.additional_context: Project-based learning course to strengthen middle school educatorsâ€™ competency in developing mathematics assessment items

learning_goals: Learners can create at least five multiple-choice formative assessment items for mathematics.
Learners can improve the appropriateness of assessment items by at least 80% by incorporating peer feedback.
Learners can complete at least one team-based digital assessment item set (SAIR) uploadable to an LMS.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
